# odr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of *anomo* is to help test the equivalence and difference (moderation) effects using the MCCI method. 
## Installation

You can install the released version of odr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("anomo")

```
